name: Monster Truck Sports
description:
You wanna drive! Better give a test drive first in high speed on tough tracks

Monster Truck Sports is a simulation in which players compete in crossing the finish line. You might have to pick and drop passenger as well.

Players can compete in single players, earning credit to buy more Trucks.

Features

- Multiple Trucks
- Multiple Tough Levels
- HD Graphics
- Cool sound Track
- Realistic Truck Controls
